alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Greene; Hancock; Jones; Putnam; Taliaferro (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 5:19PM EST until January 12 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Baldwin County in central Georgia... Putnam County in central Georgia... Hancock County in east central Georgia... Southeastern Greene County in east central Georgia... Southwestern Taliaferro County in east central Georgia... Northeastern Jones County in central Georgia... * Until 600 PM EST. * At 518 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Harmony to near Eatonton to Bradley, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Milledgeville, Eatonton, Sparta, Crawfordville, White Plains, Siloam, Phoenix, Reynolds at Lake Oconee, Midway-Hardwick, Liberty, Meriwether, Springfield, Veazey, Bradley, Beulah, Allenwood, Resseaus Crossroads, Plant Harlee Branch, Hardwick and Browns Crossing. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EST for central, north central and east central Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin; Greene; Hancock; Jones; Putnam; Taliaferro
